item.title: Syncing EteSync CalDav calendars into Spacemacs and OrgMode
item.description: Add additional packages State “DONE” from “TODO” [2020-08-10 Mon 22:11] dotspacemacs-additional-packages '( org-caldav ) Configuring your Calendars (setq org-caldav-url "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io") (setq org-caldav-calendar-id "calendarId") (setq org-caldav-check-dav "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io") (setq org-caldav-inbox "~/org/Calendar.org") (setq org-icalendar-timezone "Europe/London") (setq org-icalendar-date-time-format ";TZID=%Z:%Y%m%dT%H%M%S") Where to get the data from !!!
item.content:
Add additional packages

  • State “DONE” from “TODO” [2020-08-10 Mon 22:11]
dotspacemacs-additional-packages '(
                                   org-caldav
                                   )

Configuring your Calendars

(setq org-caldav-url "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io")
(setq org-caldav-calendar-id "calendarId")
(setq org-caldav-check-dav "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io")
(setq org-caldav-inbox "~/org/Calendar.org")
(setq org-icalendar-timezone "Europe/London")
(setq org-icalendar-date-time-format ";TZID=%Z:%Y%m%dT%H%M%S")

Where to get the data from !!!
